name: Pretty Lost in Space
description:
This is the game jam version with only the dev player!

Platformer, Level editor, level generator, particles, playable nft's, lava, fun!

If you have a pretty punk NFT: 

Go through the wallet, you can build a level for each pretty punk you own. Your level will save in Local Storage, so you can return to it later.
prettygame.herokuapp.com/wallet/

If you don't have a pretty punk and want one:
paras.id/collection/pretty-punks-by-agatheartsnear

By default, you are in an empty world!

Directions are in the box on left. 

Enter => switch between game & level editor

Zoom => Mouse scroll


Level editor

The little block outside world switches tiles,
click and drag to paint.
 m => generate / make new level
 e => erase current level


Game

Goal => Collect cute cards, kill bots
z => shoot
x => cool roll animation
arrow keys / wasd => move


TIPS : 
  • Water beats fire.
  • Bots steal your cards.
  • You lose cards when you die!
  • If you burn too long or fall off the world you will die!
  • Bots throw you off the world for fun!

... Also, there is one tiny cheat code. 



FUTURE PLANS:

Each Pretty Punk will have their own level and all pretty punks can visit each other's levels. 

The Pretty wallet pages will be further customized to their owner.

Custom space-pods, tile sheets, creatures, bots.

...maybe play to earn tokenomics

...maybe PvP battles.

...and any other ideas that seem like good ideas after more testing.
